text.style: font-size: 14px;

svg.text: Follow jurisdictional laws, international standards (ISO 27037, NIST guidelines)

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 11px; fill: white;

svg.text: Digital forensics requires systematic methodology to ensure evidence integrity and legal admissibility
